item.description:
Announcing a new Meetup for The New Hampshire 912 Project!

What: Protest Against Health Care AND Cap & Trade - LEE MOTOR SPEEDWAY , NH

When: July 31, 2009 5:30 PM

Where:
Lee Motorspeedway
380 Calef Road Route 125
Lee, NH 03824

Please join us on the 31st if you can. We will be handing out an informational flyer on HR 3200 and also on Cap and Trade upon which the Senate has yet to vote.

People will be asked to contact their Reps and tell them NO!

Friday July 31
Lee Motorspeedway
380 Calef Road Rte 125
Lee, NH
5:45 PM

Learn more here:
http://www.meetup.com...
item.name: Protest Against Health Care AND Cap & Trade - LEE MOTOR SPEEDWAY , NH
